attributes.action: honour Richard Dawkins, one of Britain's finest scentists and writers, with a knighthood.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Richard Dawkins has been at the forefront of Evolutionary Biology for over thirty years. He is regarded as one of the world's top intellectuals, as demonstrated in many leading polls. He has continually served the public by promoting scientific understanding through his books and television programmes.

Among his many awards are the Faraday Award, the Kistler Prize, the international Cosmos prize and the Royals Society of Literature award.

This man truly is a national institution and is respected worldwide. It beggars belief that he has not been recognised by this country for his vast achievements and service.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
